attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
MARIO 

DEAR MR BROWN, 
I HAVE A PROPOSITION FOR YOU, MARIO IS A WORLD HERO HE HAS DONE A LOT FOR US, HE HAS SHOWN US THE WAY TO THE LIGHT AND TO FIGHT THE EVIL IN THE WORLD, SUCH AS BOWSER AND THE KOOPAS, AND THE GOOMBAS, HIS T.V SHOW HAS LED ME TO BECOME LIKE HIM AND SOLVE PEOPLES PLUMBING PROBLEMS, SO I PROPOSE TO YOU WE HAVE A MARIO DAY, IF YOU DO THIS SOME PEOPLE MAY LIKE YOU NOW

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
